verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, You are my home I am never alone For Your Spirit is sweet life in me. As I came from Your side So the Spirit and bride Said,”Lord come for Your face we would see.”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come, Lord, quickly come. Come and dwell in the house That’s Your home. For we wait Your return And with passion we burn Just for You Lord, dear Lord, quickly come. (repeat){/lang-eng}
